roleset.name: to evade a responsibility or an object
roleset.note: DUCK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'duck' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from duck.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [Drug makers]-2 should n't be able [*-2]to duck liability because people could n't identify precisely which identical drug [*T*-3] was used [*-1] .
example.arg: because people could n't identify precisely which identical drug [*T*-3] was used [*-1]

example.name: Actual Object
example.text: I ducked under a boulder, and he never sensed me.
